faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.intro: Quick answers to popular questions to help you get the most out of the system.

pricing.a: Yes. Maasroti is completely free and non-profit. In the future we may add optional advanced features without affecting the free core.

privacy.q: How do you protect privacy and data?
privacy.a: We use industry-standard security practices, store only what’s needed, and never share personal data with third parties unless required by law or with your consent.

howItWorks.q: How does it work in short?
howItWorks.a: You record income and donations. The system calculates the required maaser, tracks coverage, and shows a clear monthly/yearly snapshot.

maaserCalc.q: How is the maaser amount calculated?
maaserCalc.a: By default it’s 10% of net income. You can change the percentage in Settings. The system computes automatically and shows surplus or debt.

donationsTypes.a: One-time, recurring (monthly), installments (fixed count), and limited/unlimited length. Each shows status and progress.

installments.a: Set the total number of payments and how many were completed. The system tracks progress and knows when the commitment ends.

multiCurrency.a: A single base currency (ILS or USD) is used for calculations. Entries in a different currency are marked as converted using the fixed rate from Settings.

carryOver.a: Choose in Settings whether to reset the balance at the start of the new civil year or carry surplus/debt into the next year.

notifications.a: Yes. You can receive reminders about ending donations, accumulated debt, and a monthly summary. No spam and you can disable anytime.

account.q: Do I need an account to use it?
account.a: Yes. An account securely stores your data and lets you access it from any device.

feedback.q: How can I suggest an improvement or report a bug?
feedback.a: Use the 'Send feedback' link in the main menu. We appreciate ideas and reports to make the system better.
